mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from (select prod_id, prod_name, lprod_nm, prod_insdate from prod, lprod where prod.prod_lgu = lprod.lprod_gu order by prod_id) a ) where rnum between (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} + 1 and #{page}*#{pageSize}
select prod_id, prod_name, lprod_nm, buyer_name, buyer_mail from prod, lprod, buyer where prod_id = #{prod_id} and prod.prod_lgu = lprod.lprod_gu and prod.prod_buyer = buyer.buyer_id
